sentences.sentence: He has the upbeat manner of an eternal optimist.
sentences.translation: 他永远都持乐观主义者的那种快乐态度。

sentences.sentence: The Defense Secretary gave an upbeat assessment of the war so far.
sentences.translation: 国防部长对迄今为止的战事进行了乐观的评价。

sentences.sentence: The tone of the speech was upbeat.
sentences.translation: 这次讲话的语气颇为乐观。
